Name: Mcpherson
Description: The Division of McPherson consists of part of the Gold Coast City Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Tourism and associated industries and a variety of small industries.
NameDerivation: Named after the McPherson Range for the range which runs north-west from Mount Glennie.
Members:

May, M (LP) 1998-2010

DemographicRating: Provincial - outside capital cities, but with a majority of enrolment in major provincial cities
